mapper.select: SELECT caseinfo.caseid, sickerinfo.sickid, sickerinfo.sickname, prescinfo.prescid, druginfo.drugname, druginfo.druginven, prescinfo.drugcount, druginfo.drugspeci, prescinfo.prescstate FROM caseinfo, prescinfo, druginfo, sickerinfo WHERE prescinfo.drugid = druginfo.drugid AND prescinfo.caseid = caseinfo.caseid AND caseinfo.sickid = sickerinfo.sickid AND caseinfo.caseid = #{caseid}
